stealth.summary: Hiding and evasion let the player survive encounters with revealed or suspicious crew by using darkness, cover, and timing instead of open conflict.

crafting.summary: Combining scavenged tools into improvised gear should be data-driven, feed the event bus, and reward planning over raw stats.

recipes.name: Makeshift Torch
recipes.description: A wired lantern bundled for stealth sweeps.

recipes.name: Improvised Spear
recipes.description: A sharpened handle wrapped with wire for close-quarters defense.

endings.summary: Multiple endings should surface through events so UI layers can react without being coupled to win/lose checks.

ESCAPE.name: Helicopter Escape
ESCAPE.condition: Player pilots the helicopter to safety.
ESCAPE.message: You pilot the chopper through the storm, leaving the nightmare of Outpost 31 behind.

RESCUE.name: Rescue Arrival
RESCUE.condition: Rescue team arrives while player is alive and human.
RESCUE.message: Lights cut through the storm. The rescue team has arrived to extract you.

EXTERMINATION.name: Threat Neutralized
EXTERMINATION.message: All Things have been eliminated. Humanity survives... for now.

SOLE_SURVIVOR.name: Sole Survivor
SOLE_SURVIVOR.condition: Only the player remains alive and human.
SOLE_SURVIVOR.message: Silence falls over the station. You are the only one left alive. The threat is gone... you hope.

CONSUMPTION.name: Humanity Lost
CONSUMPTION.condition: All humans are gone or the player is infected and revealed.
CONSUMPTION.message: There are no humans left. The Thing has won.

DEATH.name: MacReady Deceased
DEATH.message: MacReady is dead. The Thing spreads unchecked across the ice.

endings.message: You pilot the chopper through the storm, leaving the nightmare of Outpost 31 behind.
Lights cut through the storm. The rescue team has arrived to extract you.
Silence falls over the station. You are the only one left alive. The threat is gone... you hope.
